assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: FMZ, FZ, AS, SL and MMM are employees of GeneDx, Inc.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This retrospective study was approved by the Institutional Review Board of the Rouen University Hospital (CERDE, Comité d’Ethique pour la Recherche sur Données Existantes et Hors Loi Jardé, Rouen, France) (notification n°69–2020).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all participants included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Patients’ guardians signed informed consent regarding publishing their data and photographs.
